#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	while(1)
	{
		int a,b,count=0;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		if(a==0 && b==0)
			break;
		while(a!=0 && b!=0)
		{
			if((a%10 + b%10)/10!=0)
				count++;
			a=a/10;
			b=b/10;
		}
		if(count==0)
			printf("No carry operation.\n");
		else if(count==1)
			printf("1 carry operation.\n");
		else
			printf("%d carry operations.\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
